description:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass "Legendary Town Building Set". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

A Facility Design set provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass.

This set adds "Arland" series inspired designs that can be chosen for ateliers and shops built in the city.
Note: You can construct facilities by opening "Town Building" in the Weekday main menu.
name: Facility Pack: Arland
